metadata.Plot: This documentary short purports to be a first person account narrated by a member of the Zionist militant organization Irgun about the impetus, rationale, planning, and executive of the the bombing of the King David Hotel on July 22, 1946. The narration is superimposed over documentary news footage. The script was written by Larry Ravitz and the score arranged by Professor A.W. Binder Quentin Reynolds and Bill Parker narrate.

relatedMovies.title: How to Fly the P-47: Ground Handling, Take Off, Normal Flight
